## Outline

> - Randomness, uncertainty in measurement

> - Inference (interpreting results)

## Randomness

```{r spinner, echo=FALSE, fig.height = 3, fig.width = 3, fig.align = "center"}
library("animation")
par(mar = c(0,0,0,0))
plot.new()
fig.align="center"

#draw circle
r = 0.5
cen = c(0.5,0.5)
n = 1000
angles = (1:n)/n*2*pi
xs = cos(angles)*r+cen[1]
ys = sin(angles)*r+cen[2]
polygon(xs,ys)

#segments (discrete)


```

> - Common random-number generators: dice, spinners, cards, coins, tops...
> - There is uncertainty everywhere.
> - How long will it take to get home?
